titleStmt.title: The Devonshire boys courage and loyalty to their Majesties King William and Queen Mary in defending their country from the invasion of the French. To an excellent new tune; call'd The Devonshire boys delight: or, The liggan waters, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Brave Devonshire boys made haste away,".
Place and date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
"The Devonsire damsels frollick" (Wing D1237) printed on the verso.
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
